channel.title: TFS 2013 Update 2 on Giulio Vian's Blog!

item.title: Third upgrade in a row
item.description: Last week I upgraded our TFS infrastructure from 2013 to 2013 Update 2. It was the third upgrade since I started working in this company, which means 3 upgrades in 4 months! This says something about our Development Directors which want the latest features because they need them; it is also a consequence of Product Group’s innovation pace. Call me lucky. The DevOps movement keeps repeating: the harder to deploy, the more often you have to do it.

item.title: A small nice touch from TFS 2013.2
item.description: No more fussing around to move the cache folder: TFS 2013 Update 2 add a nice link at your fingertips on the Administration Console. Now, I just need to find how to script this settingâ€¦
